org.threadly.util
Class Clock

java.lang.Object
  org.threadly.util.Clock

public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility class for low-resolution timing which avoids frequent System.currentTimeMillis() calls (which perform poorly because they require system calls). Each call to Clock.lastKnownTimeMillis() will return the value of System.currentTimeMillis() as of the last call to Clock.accurateTime(). This means lastKnownTimeMillis() will only be as accurate as the frequency with which accurateTime() is called.
